sentence: If Masters is able to win the Republican senatorial primary and unseat Mark Kelly, Arizona can be the stepping stone towards garnering for the America First movement one of its most significant victories of 2022.
author: Kenny Cody
title: A Blake Masters Ariz. Win Would Boost America First Movement

sentence: https://t.co/wbFO0wU76O — Fred Guttenberg (@fred_guttenberg) February 10, 2022 In which a Republican candidate for Senate play acts shooting a gun at, among others, Senator Mark Kelly, whose wife, former Congresswoman Gabby Giffords, was gravely injured by gunfire in real life.
author: Lee Moran
title: GOP Sen Candidate Shoots At Biden, Pelosi Lookalikes In 'Disgusting' Ad

sentence: Doug Ducey has notified Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell that he will not enter his state's high-profile Senate contest, a disappointing development for establishment Republicans who saw Ducey as their best hope to defeat Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly this fall.
title: No Senate run for Arizona Gov. Ducey, blow to GOP recruiting

sentence: The Arizona Republican primary to challenge Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., is shaping up to be a close one between a pair of America First candidates surging in two polls released Monday.
author: Eric Mack
title: Two Polls Show Close Race Between Masters, Lamon

sentence: Blake did not hold back in attacking Mark Kelly for supporting this outrageous Supreme Court pick.
author: Jim Hoft
title: “To Put a P*dophile Apologist on Supreme Court, It Makes My Blood Boil” – Blake Masters Says Out Loud What We All Know Is True about Today’s Democrats (VIDEO)

sentence: According to the report from the Beast's Roger Sollenberger, Peter Thiel -- one of Facebook's early investors -- is putting a substantial amount of money behind fellow tech executive Blake Masters who is seeking the seat currently being held by Sen. Mark Kelly (D).
author: Tom Boggioni
title: Pro-Trump Senate candidate using his campaign to promote billionaire backer's businesses: report

sentence: He is running against several other Republicans for the nomination to take on Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly, including state Attorney General Mark Brnovich and businessman Jim Lamon.
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Pro-Trump Arizona candidate complains Biden's new rules wouldn't let him build his 'very cool' ghost gun

sentence: The candidates are vying for a chance to run against incumbent Democratic senator Mark Kelly, who is viewed as one of the most vulnerable candidates in the election cycle.
author: Washington Free Beacon Staff
title: Poll: Lamon Leads in Arizona’s GOP Senate Primary

sentence: There’s a pretty crowded field of Republican candidates vying to unseat first-term senator and gun control activist Mark Kelly from his seat in Arizona later this year, but to the best of my knowledge only one of them has proudly talked about building his own guns.
author: Cam Edwards
title: AZ Senate candidate: gun control is dead

sentence: He said the firm’s latest polling shows a generic Republican beating a generic Democrat in three races it is tracking, but that “Kelly is leading against a generic Republican.” “Whether you agree with Mark Kelly or not politically, he has proven to be out-of-this-world in his fundraising prowess, and it’ll be key to his reelection,” Noble said in an email Monday.
author: Camila Pedrosa
title: Arizona Senate race nets $61.5 million; Kelly one of top U.S. fundraisers

sentence: He said the firm’s latest polling shows a generic Republican beating a generic Democrat in three races it is tracking, but that “Kelly is leading against a generic Republican.” “Whether you agree with Mark Kelly or not politically, he has proven to be out-of-this-world in his fundraising prowess, and it’ll be key to his reelection,” Noble said in an email Monday.
title: Arizona Senate race nets $61.5 million; Kelly one of top U.S. fundraisers – Cronkite News
